name: Accountnet Software
tagline: Provides core services to accomplish goals
description: AccountNet is a provider of a range of core services that commercial businesses, not for profit organizations (“NPOs”) and governmental agencies need in order to successfully accomplish their defined goals. Some but not all the services that AccountNet provides include: Business Analysis and Evaluation, Business Planning and Road Mapping, Strategy and Marketing Development, Human, Financial, and Physical Resources Management, Implementation Support, and Accounting
